Am I the only one severely disappointed in the fact that they no longer redo the map for the holidays? That used to be my favorite thing. I'm just glad this came out on time instead of a month after the holiday like the halloween one. Rito please go back to making the map festive too. Snowy minnions look silly on a spring-time map.

So is anyone else super dissapointed that the Happy Elf Teemo skin only drops normal shrooms? I was so excited to finally get this skin but I was hoping for presents or something Christmasy! I mean even Bards health circles are hot coco, I just want to make presents explode on people :({{champion:17}}
the skins are really nice, but I would rather have a festive summoner's rift than skins and discounts. we go thru this every year though

So in the self mystery gifting section it says that if you self gift yourself any of the stuff, you will get another gift free. To me I read, "Gift yourself the 150 rp mystery icon and you can get something in the Champion, Champion Skins, Ward Skins, or Summoner Icon section worth 520 or more". Except summoner icons don't go for more than 250 max so I don't think you can get an icon. So I gifted myself the icon in the hopes of getting a skin or something, but I didn't get the extra gift either. Just bought a mystery icon for 150 and that's it. Correct me if I'm wrong please and someone explain it to me!!!!

I have no idea where you got that from. This is what that section says:

"From December 10 until December 15 at 23:59 PST, snag a randomly selected un-owned champ, skin, ward, or icon currently in the store worth 520 RP or higher with self Mystery Gifting. Mystery skins, of course, will only be unlocked for champs you own. So go ahead, treat yourself."

Meaning, you can give mystery gifts to yourself which isn't a usual thing. That is all.
There's nothing saying that you get another free gift.

I believe they changed the original text in the section I was talking about shortly after. I could be wrong, you'd have to get someone else to confirm it. I think they saw the section and how it was confusing and fixed it up, because I had spent like 10 minutes reading it and rereading it over and over to make sure I wasn't crazy and when I read it again recently it wasn't confusing whatsoever to me and I understood it instantly. Called my brother to the room to read it and ask him if I was crazy (he maybe didn't pay attention not sure or he thought I was crazy and just went along) but I was almost certain it said that. Emphasis on the "was". Thanks for the clarification though. I now know I'm crazy. {{champion:35}} {{item:3070}}
i might just ask you what the ice cubes worth

Hello Rioters! I am a little confused as to how the legendary/ultimate skin unlocks a free mystery skin. I just bought Corporate Mundo to do some... filing, but I didn't receive an extra skin with it. Is it just for gifting/mystery gifting, or am I just completely misunderstanding how this works? xD 

Thank you for reading,
Chestervy <3
UPDATE: I also got EXTREMELY lucky by getting Dunkmaster Darius from a mystery gift (thank you rito gods) but the same thing, I didn't receive an extra skin with it. :c
